Home > misc > dist > stk_filldist.m

stk_filldist

PURPOSE

STK_FILLDIST computes the (discrete) fill distance of a set of points

SYNOPSIS

This is a script file.

DESCRIPTION 

 STK_FILLDIST computes the (discrete) fill distance of a set of points

 CALL: D = stk_filldist(X, Y)

    computes the fill distance D of X using the "test set" Y. More
    precisely, if X is an n x d matrix and Y an m x d matrix, then

       D = max_{1 <= j <= m} min_{1 <= i <= n} norm(X(i,:) - Y(j,:)),

    where norm(.) denotes the Euclidean norm in R^d. The fill distance
    is also known as the "maximin" distance.

 CALL: [D, ARGMAX] = stk_filldist(X, Y)

    also returns the value ARGMAX of the index j for which the maximum
    is obtained. (If the maximum is obtained for several values of j,
    the smallest is returned.)

 See also: stk_distance_matrix, stk_mindist

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:

0047 %%
0048 % Two non-empty matrices are expected as input arguments
0049 
0050 %!error stk_filldist(0.0)            % incorrect nb of arguments
0051 %!error stk_filldist(0.0, 0.0, pi)   % incorrect nb of arguments
0052 %!error stk_filldist(0.0, [])        % second arg is empty
0053 %!error stk_filldist([], 0.0)        % first arg is empty
0054 
0055 %%
0056 % Filldist = 0 if X = Y
0057 
0058 %!test
0059 %! n = 5;
0060 %! for dim = 1:10,
0061 %!     x = rand(n, dim);
0062 %!     fd = stk_filldist(x, x);
0063 %!     assert(stk_isequal_tolabs(fd, 0.0));
0064 %! end
0065 
0066 %%
0067 % Filldist = norm if nx = ny = 1
0068 
0069 %!test
0070 %! for dim = 1:10,
0071 %!     x = rand(1, dim);
0072 %!     y = rand(1, dim);
0073 %!     fd = stk_filldist(x, y);
0074 %!     assert(stk_isequal_tolabs(fd, norm(x - y)));
0075 %! end
0076 
0077 %%
0078 % Filldist = max(dist) if ny = 1
0079 
0080 %!test
0081 %! n = 4;
0082 %! for dim = 2:10,
0083 %!     x = zeros(n, dim);
0084 %!     y = rand(1, dim);
0085 %!     fd = stk_filldist(x, y);
0086 %!     assert(stk_isequal_tolabs(fd, max(stk_dist(x, y))));
0087 %! end
